Name: Solar Flare
Description:
Deploys a solar powered sentry with an attack range of up to 8.2 meters. When directed, the sentry will shoot a beam of energy that inflicts damage to a monster in range.

The weapon will lose charge while fired or while the sentry has sight of the monster.

Misc.ToolTip: The base crafting time of the Solar Flare
The amount of time the Solar Flare can continuously or gradually be fired from full charge before being completely depleted.
The amount of continuous damage required by the Solar Flare in order to wound or stun the monster.
The default range of the Solar Flare's beam.
The base time it takes to summon the Solar Flare.
The amount of time it takes for the Solar Flare to warm up when initially trying to fire it.
The default number of Solar Flares that can be spawned at once.
The multiplier applied to the Solar Flare's charge reduction during warmup.
The additional multiplier applied to the Solar Flare's charge reduction while firing. It's nothing, so it follows the base charge time.

DetailedStats.Name: Percentage Threshold to Create New Mine

Misc.ToolTip: The minimum percentage threshold required to create a new mine when using the summon key.

DetailedStats.Name: Percentage Threshold to Cancel Old Mine

Misc.ToolTip: The minimum percentage threshold required to cancel an old mine when using the summon key.
The maximum distance a mine must be and a newly summoned mine must be for the new mine to not override the other. This may be incorrect!
The minimum drain rate the Solar Flare when the monster is in sight of it.
The maximum drain rate the Solar Flare when the monster is in sight of it.

DetailedStats.Name: Monster View Drain Rate Ramp Time

Misc.ToolTip: The amount of time the monster must be looking at the Solar Flare for it to begin draining at the maximum rate.
The maximum range the monster can be from the Solar Flare in addition to line of sight in order for the Solar Flare to begin draining charges.
The multiplier applied to the drain speed decay when the monster loses view of the Solar Flare within the specified maximum range.
The multiplier applied to the Solar Flare's gravity.
The height offset of the Solar Flare's beam when firing at a target. This may be incorrect!
The movement speed multiplier applied to teens when aiming the Solar Flare (firing).

WeaponMods.Name: Jewel Polish
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The energy consumed when firing the Solar Flare is decreased by 25%.
- The Solar Flare takes an additional 15% longer to craft.

Misc.ToolTip: The bonus multiplier applied to the charge consumption while firing the Solar Flare when the user has Jewel Polish equipped.
The penalty multiplier applied to the crafting time of the Solar Flare while the user has Jewel Polish equipped.

WeaponMods.Name: Blazing Sentry
WeaponMods.Description:
+ The monster gains the Exposed status effect while within attack range of the sentry.
- The time needed to summon a sentry is increased by 25%.

Misc.ToolTip: The penalty multiplier applied to the summoning time of the Solar Flare while Blazing Sentry is equipped.

WeaponMods.Name: Dancing Spark
WeaponMods.Description: * Once summoned, the Solar Flare will slowly move forward until it collides with a solid obstacle.

Misc.ToolTip: The movement speed of the Solar Flare while Dancing Spark is equipped.

WeaponMods.Name: Solar Revelation
WeaponMods.Description:
* When channeling the Solar Flare you will become immobile and your viewpoint will change to the perspective of the summoned sentry.
+ 50% less energy is used during the warm up period prior to firing the Solar Flare.

Misc.ToolTip: The bonus multiplier applied to the charge consumption on the Solar Flare during the warmup stage before firing.

WeaponMods.Name: Flame Charmer
WeaponMods.Description:
+ You may summon up to 2 sentries at once.
- The energy consumed while firing the Solar Flare is increased by 50%.

Misc.ToolTip: The maximum amount of Solar Flares that can be spawned when the user has Flame Charmer equipped.
The penalty multiplier applied when firing either Solar Flare while the user has Flame Charmer equipped.
